org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster.impl.api.core

Interface ZBDeserializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDeserializer

    public interface ZBDeserializer
    The interface for helping the deserialization ZCL frame on array of byte
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

      • readString

        java.lang.String readString()
        Deprecated. readZigBeeType(ZigBeeType) should be used instead
        Parse a String from the stream considering the first byte as the length of the
        String itself as specified by the ZigBee Cluster Library (Document 075123r01ZB
        Returns:
        the parsed String
        Since:
        0.4.0

      • readObject

        java.lang.Object readObject(java.lang.Class clazz)
        Deprecated. Use readZigBeeType(ZigBeeType) instead
        Since version 0.4.0 the method must not used, use readZigBeeType(ZigBeeType) instead.
        This method has a conceptual bug in respect to the parsing of 8, 16, or 24 bit long data, in fact
        the methods can only fail in such cases.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the Class used to select the proper parsing
        Returns:
        the parse Object from the stream depending the Class specified
